paragraphs: It pains me to know of your opposition to Ayrenn. While I can see your view on maintaining the purity of the Summerset Isles, I cannot disregard the importance of what our queen is trying to do.

As I have a close relationship with both of you, I am unable to take sides in your argument. Firsthold shall remain neutral, and our priorities lie solely in the protection of Auridon from our enemies.
